snippet.title: Apostle: Rebellion - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The megalopolis Neo-Eden is home to many different kinds of people, including those who have machine implants. As a member of “Affecis” which was created to fight against aliens known as “Magna,” it is your destiny to destroy them and save the world. 

Apostle: Rebellion on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/apostle-rebellion/

Apostle: Rebellion on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/

Follow us:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Kagura

Steam Group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/kaguragames

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KaguraGames

Facebook: https://facebook.com/kaguragames

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kagura.games/

Discord: https://discord.gg/kaguragames

Website: https://www.kaguragames.com https://kagura.games/
